org.sqlite.database.sqlite

Class SQLiteProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteClosable
      • org.sqlite.database.sqlite.SQLiteProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SQLiteQuery, SQLiteStatement

    public abstract class SQLiteProgram
extends SQLiteClosable
    A base class for compiled SQLite programs.

    This class is not thread-safe.

      • clearBindings

        public void clearBindings()
        Clears all existing bindings. Unset bindings are treated as NULL.

      • bindAllArgsAsStrings

        public void bindAllArgsAsStrings(java.lang.String[] bindArgs)
        Given an array of String bindArgs, this method binds all of them in one single call.
        Parameters:
        bindArgs - the String array of bind args, none of which must be null.
